title: The Wellington
description: Pub in the city centre, able to provide an extensive menu of vegan real ales, ciders, and wines on request in its upstairs bar. Food is not served, but customers could bring food from outside and are provided with cutlery. Vegan options in both bottled and on draft, and the "beer board" on the pub's webpage allows drinkers to research the potential vegan options on draft in advance.
